author: jmannix
msg: Initial import of decomposer core for MAHOUT-180 (decomposer-core, the part which doesn't have any Hadoop tricks).
Also fixes MAHOUT-211 (for the most part - there's probably some optimization to be done to that part of it).
Next up - decomposer-contrib, which has some hadoop-specialized stuff.
